Compatible with iOS 8 to 12.

Skinnyhud gives you the visual options to Hide/Disable the Background, the Panel and the Dots of the Volume HUD Box.

The Tweak also allows you to choose to Force the Volume HUD Box to stay visible on the Screen.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.
